Title: Protect human rights and eradicate evil cults
Designer: Zhang Hongwei (张宏伟)Kong Simeng (孔思孟)
Publisher: Zhongyang minzu daxue chubanshe (中央民族大学出版社)
Notes: Seventh sheet of the series Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cults (私扬正气铲除邪教), published in 2001.The poster shows images of meetings and events aimed at protecting human rights and eradicating cults.
Theme: Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cultsFalun Gong
